textBox.richText: Starting out the day, had a work fire explode. Did some business from the lift, but I couldn’t risk running Phresheez on the Droid and not being able to do email/phone. Note, I fixed that shortly thereafter by getting a spare battery for the Droid and keeping both charged. Played around a little with helmet-cam. Got some good shots of Max doing Retta’s, at least until he took a major fall (way in front of me). That pretty much ended his day; I ended up playing around a little more in the trees.
